author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND GRADUALLY STRENGTHENING OVER THE CENTRAL SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC OCEAN...
summary: ...FERNAND GRADUALLY STRENGTHENING OVER THE CENTRAL SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC OCEAN... As of 5:00 PM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 31.8, -59.8 with movement NNE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND GRADUALLY STRENGTHENING OVER THE CENTRAL SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC OCEAN... As of 5:00 PM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 31.8, -59.8 with movement NNE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
